DeepAnalysis.hh

00001 /*******************************************************************
00002 *       Cluster finding and analysis                               *
00003 *                                                                  *
00004 *  Hadronic shower analysis using hit density, shower topology     *
00005 *  and cluster shapes to find shower component of different        *
00006 *  physical origin, such as pure tracks, electromagnetic           *
00007 *  cascades inside hadronic shower; and hits that produced by      *
00008 *  neutrons.                                                       *
00009 *                                                                  *
00010 *         Author    V.L. Morgunov                                  *
00011 *         created  22-Jun-2003                                     *
00012 *                                                                  *
00013 *     Last update  V.L.Morgunov     22-Jun-2003                    *
00014 *     Last update  V.L.Morgunov     05-Aug-2003                    *
00015 *     Last update  V.L.Morgunov     13-Sep-2003                    *
00016 *                                                                  *
00017 *     Converted to C     A. Zhelezov      1.2007                   *
00018 *     RS structure       A. Zhelezov      1/2.2007                 *
00019 *                                                                  *
00020 *     Last update  V.L.Morgunov     07-Jan-2007                    *
00021 *     Last update  V.L.Morgunov     28-Feb-2007                    *
00022 *     Last update  V.L.Morgunov     15-Mach-2007                   *
00023 *     Last update  V.L.Morgunov     12-August-2007                 *
00024 *     Last update  V.L.Morgunov     18-September-2007              *
00025 *                                                                  *
00026 *******************************************************************/

00052 class DeepAnalysis : public RS {
00053     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00054   public:
00055     
00058     class Detector { 
00059       public:
00060         double sampling;        
00061         double cell_size;       
00062         double ext_cell_size;   
00063         double neut_thresh;     
00064         double normal_thresh;   
00065         // Changing this value one changes the spherical shell curvature
00066         double zoom_dist;   
00069         double shift;       
00070         double a_delta;     
00072         double elips_trans_to_catch;
00073         double elips_forw_to_catch; 
00074         double elips_back_to_catch; 
00075         double join_factor; 
00076         double sph_cut;     
00078         double cut_3d_em;   
00079         double cut_3d_had;  
00081         double ecc_trk_hadr_sel;    
00100         Detector() {
00101           sampling            = 30.0;
00102           cell_size           = 30.0;
00103           ext_cell_size       = 30.0;
00104           neut_thresh         = 0.6;
00105           normal_thresh       = 0.5;
00106           elips_trans_to_catch= 1.5;
00107           elips_forw_to_catch = 1.5;
00108           elips_back_to_catch = 1.0;
00109           ecc_trk_hadr_sel    = 0.3;
00110           a_delta             = 0.01;
00111           sph_cut             = 0.05; // about 3 degree
00112           // Here is should be the calculation of both distances in the adaptive way 
00113           // taking into account - sampling distance and tile sizes
00114           cut_3d_em           = 31.0;
00115           cut_3d_had          = 81.0;
00116           join_factor         = 1.0;
00117           zoom_dist           = 200.0;
00118         }
00119 
00123         void init(double hit_dist)
00124         {
00125           a_delta     = cell_size/zoom_dist; // [radians]
00126           shift       = zoom_dist - hit_dist;
00127           join_factor = sqrt(cell_size) + 0.01;
00128 
00129 #ifdef DeepAnalysis_DEBUG
00130           cout<<"=========================================================="<<endl;
00131           cout<<"        Detector was initialized with:"<<endl
00132               <<"  Sampling = "<<sampling
00133               <<", Cell_size = "<<cell_size
00134               <<", Ext_cell_size = "<<ext_cell_size<<endl
00135               <<"  Normal thresh = "<<normal_thresh
00136               <<", Neutr thresh = "<<neut_thresh
00137               <<endl;
00138           cout<<"        DeepAnalysis was initialized with:"<<endl
00139               <<"  Zoom dist. = "<<zoom_dist
00140               <<"  Hit dist. "<<hit_dist
00141               <<"  Shift = "<<shift<<endl
00142               <<", Hist. bin size = "<<a_delta
00143               <<", Sph cut. = "<<sph_cut<<"("<<sph_cut*RADDEG<<")"<<endl
00144               <<"  3-D cluster to join = "<<join_factor
00145               <<", EM cut to join = "<<cut_3d_em
00146               <<", HAD cut to join = "<<cut_3d_had
00147               <<endl;
00148           cout<<"=========================================================="<<endl;
00149 #endif
00150         }
00151     };
00152     Detector detector;

00167     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00170     class Hit : public RSObj {
00171       public:
00172         static const unsigned RS_TYPE = 0;
00174         unsigned idx;    
00175         Point3D  cartesianPoint;     
00176         Sphere3D sphere3d;     
00177         double   amplGeV;     
00178         double   ampl_mip; 
00179         double   thr;    
00180         unsigned lay;    
00181         int addr;        
00184         Hit() : RSObj(RS_TYPE) {}
00185 
00186         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00198         void set(unsigned _idx,double _x,double _y,double _z,
00199                  double _am,double _ampl_mip,double _thr,unsigned _lay, int _addr){
00200           //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00201           idx =_idx;
00202           cartesianPoint.calc(_x,_y,_z);
00203           sphere3d.calc(cartesianPoint);
00204           amplGeV  = _am;
00205           ampl_mip = _ampl_mip;
00206           thr      = _thr;
00207           lay      = _lay;
00208           addr     = _addr;
00209         }
00210         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00216         void draw(unsigned type, unsigned size, unsigned color){
00217 // #ifdef HAVE_CED

00219 //                cartesianPoint.y,
00220 //                cartesianPoint.z,
00221 //                type, size, color);
00222 //        ced_hit(cartesianPoint.x*10.,
00223 //                cartesianPoint.y*10.,
00224 //                cartesianPoint.z*10.,
00225 //                type, size, color);
00226 // #endif
00227         }
00228         KIND get_color(DeepAnalysis &rs);
00229     };

00240     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00245     class HitGroup : public RSObj {
00246       public:
00247         static const unsigned RS_TYPE = 2;
00249         HitGroup() : RSObj(RS_TYPE) {}
00250 
00251         Vector3D centerOfGravity;     
00252         double  energySum;           
00253         MinMaxRange<int>      layer_g; 
00254         MinMaxRange<double>   radius_g; 
00255         MinMaxRange<double>   theta_g; 
00256         MinMaxRange<double>   phi_g; 
00257         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00260         void calc_stat(){
00261           centerOfGravity.calc(0.,0.,0.);
00262           energySum = 0.;
00263           layer_g.init();
00264           radius_g.init();
00265           theta_g.init();
00266           phi_g.init();
00267 
00268           RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this);
00269           while(hitIterator.next()){
00270             Hit &hit = *hitIterator;
00271             energySum += hit.amplGeV;
00272             accumulate(centerOfGravity, hit.cartesianPoint, hit.amplGeV);
00273             layer_g.set(hit.lay);
00274             radius_g.set(hit.sphere3d.r);
00275             theta_g.set(hit.sphere3d.t);
00276             phi_g.set(hit.sphere3d.p);
00277           }
00278 
00279           if(energySum!=0.) centerOfGravity.divide(energySum); 
00280         }
00281         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00287         void draw(unsigned type, unsigned size, unsigned color){
00288           RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this);
00289           while(hitIterator.next())
00290             hitIterator->draw(type, size, color);
00291         }
00292     };
00293

00320     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00325     class Cluster : public HitGroup {
00326       public:
00327         static const unsigned RS_TYPE = 6;
00330         enum {
00331           EMPTY, 
00332           ONEHIT,
00333           CL2D,  
00334           CHAIN, 
00335           JOINED,
00336           EXT    
00337         } type;
00338 
00339         Sphere3D sp2d; 
00340         double    e2d; 
00342         KIND col;        
00343         Vector3D clusterAxisVector;      
00344         double  clusterRadius;       
00345         double  clusterLongestRadius;      
00346         double  forwRadius; 
00347         double  backwRadius; 
00348         double  r2;      
00349         double  r3;      
00350         double  ecc;     
00351         double  ellipAverageRadius;   
00352         double  volume;  
00353         double  density; 
00354         double  chi[3];  
00355         Hit *begn;       
00356         Hit *last;       
00357         double v1[3],v2[3],v3[3]; 
00360         Cluster() : HitGroup(),type(EMPTY) { AddRSType(RS_TYPE); }
00361         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00364         void calc_color(DeepAnalysis &rs){
00365           //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00366           unsigned n[KIND_COUNT], n_neut = 0;
00367           memset(n, 0, sizeof(n));
00368 
00369           for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this); hitIterator.next();){
00370             KindGroup *kg = hitIterator->getParent<KindGroup>();
00371 
00372             for(unsigned i = 0; i<KIND_COUNT; i++)
00373               if(kg == rs.kind[i]){
00374                 n[i]++;
00375                 break;
00376               }
00377             if(hitIterator->getParent<NeutGroup>())
00378               n_neut++;
00379           }
00380           double nnn  = getNumberOf<Hit>();
00381           double pmip = double(n[TRK])/nnn;
00382           double pem  = double(n[EM])/nnn;
00383           double phad = double(n[HAD])/nnn;
00384 
00385           col = NEUTR;
00386           if(pmip >= pem + phad)      col = TRK;
00387           if(pem > pmip + phad)       col = EM;
00388           if(phad > pmip + pem)       col = HAD;
00389           if(nnn <= 4 && n_neut > 0)  col = NEUTR;
00390           if(n[EM] >= 3)              col = EM;
00391         }
00392         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00395         void inertia_3d(float *wr){ 
00396           float a[3][3], zr[3][3], work[20];
00397           memset(wr, 0, sizeof(wr));
00398           memset(a, 0, sizeof(a));
00399           memset(zr, 0, sizeof(zr));
00400           float weig = 0.0;
00401 
00402           // Calculate tensor of inertia
00403           for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this); hitIterator.next();){
00404             Hit &hit = *hitIterator;
00405             //Point3D p=h.cartesianPoint - s;
00406             Point3D p(hit.cartesianPoint.x - centerOfGravity.x,
00407                       hit.cartesianPoint.y - centerOfGravity.y,
00408                       hit.cartesianPoint.z - centerOfGravity.z);
00409 
00410             a[0][0] += hit.amplGeV * (p.y * p.y + p.z * p.z);
00411             a[1][1] += hit.amplGeV * (p.x * p.x + p.z * p.z);
00412             a[2][2] += hit.amplGeV * (p.x * p.x + p.y * p.y);
00413             a[0][1] -= hit.amplGeV * (p.x * p.y);
00414             a[0][2] -= hit.amplGeV * (p.x * p.z);
00415             a[1][2] -= hit.amplGeV * (p.y * p.z);
00416             weig += hit.amplGeV;
00417           }
00418           a[1][0] = a[0][1];
00419           a[2][0] = a[0][2];
00420           a[2][1] = a[1][2];
00421 
00422           int ierror = 0;
00423           // Eigenvalue problem solve
00424           EISRS1(3, 3,(float *)a, wr, (float *)zr, ierror, work);
00425           if(ierror) cerr<<" ERROR in INERTIA"<<endl;
00426 
00427           clusterAxisVector.calc(zr[0][0], zr[1][0], zr[2][0]);
00428           double cdir = 1.; 
00429           // Correct direction --- should go from the center of coordinates
00430           Vector3D vend = centerOfGravity + clusterAxisVector;
00431           if(vend.module() - clusterRadius < 0.){
00432             clusterAxisVector.calc(-clusterAxisVector.x, -clusterAxisVector.y, -clusterAxisVector.z);
00433             cdir = -1.;
00434           }
00435 
00436           for(int i = 0; i < 3 ; i++){
00437             v1[i] = cdir * zr[i][0];
00438             v2[i] = cdir * zr[i][1];
00439             v3[i] = cdir * zr[i][2];
00440           }
00441 
00442           double DIS1 = 0., DIS2 = 0., DIS3 = 0., weig2 = 0.;
00443 
00444           for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this); hitIterator.next();){
00445             Hit &hit = *hitIterator;
00446             weig2 += hit.amplGeV * hit.amplGeV;
00447             double tmp = dist2line(hit.cartesianPoint, centerOfGravity, clusterAxisVector);
00448 
00449             DIS1 += (tmp * hit.amplGeV) * (tmp * hit.amplGeV);
00450             DIS2 += fabs(tmp) * hit.amplGeV;
00451             DIS3 += fabs(tmp);
00452           }
00453           chi[0] = sqrt(DIS1/weig2);
00454           chi[1] = DIS2/weig;
00455           chi[2] = DIS3/getNumberOf<Hit>();
00456         }
00457         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00460         void calc_prop(DeepAnalysis &rs, bool for_em=false){
00461           calc_stat();
00462           calc_color(rs);
00463           clusterRadius = centerOfGravity.module();
00464           clusterAxisVector.calc(0.,0.,0.);
00465           clusterLongestRadius = r2 = r3 = forwRadius = backwRadius = ecc = chi[0] = chi[1] = chi[2] = 0.;
00466           begn = last = 0;
00467 
00468           unsigned nnn = getNumberOf<Hit>();
00469           if(nnn > 2){ // cluster could be treated as inertia tensor
00470             float wr[3]; //  Inertia tensor EigenValues
00471             inertia_3d(wr);
00472 
00473             //Ellipsoid parameter calculations
00474             for(unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00475               wr[i] = sqrt(wr[i]/energySum);//Normalize inertia tensor eigen values
00476             }
00477 
00478             double chisq = chi[0];
00479             clusterLongestRadius = sqrt(wr[1]*wr[2]);
00480             r2 = sqrt(wr[0] * wr[2]); // spatial axis length
00481             r3 = sqrt(wr[0] * wr[1]); 
00482             r2 = r3 = max(max(r2, r3), 0.5 * rs.detector.cell_size);
00483             double r_hit_max = -10000.;
00484             double d_begn    = 100000.;
00485             double d_last    = -100000.;
00486 
00487             for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this); hitIterator.next();){
00488               //Vector3D d=hi->cartesianPoint-s;
00489               Vector3D d(hitIterator->cartesianPoint.x - centerOfGravity.x,
00490                          hitIterator->cartesianPoint.y - centerOfGravity.y,
00491                          hitIterator->cartesianPoint.z - centerOfGravity.z);
00492 
00493               double r_max = d.module();
00494               if(r_max > r_hit_max) r_hit_max = r_max;
00495 
00496               float proj = d.dot(clusterAxisVector);
00497               if(proj < d_begn){
00498                 d_begn = proj;
00499                 begn   = &hitIterator;
00500               }
00501               if(proj > d_last){
00502                 d_last = proj;
00503                 last   = &hitIterator;
00504               }
00505             }
00506             forwRadius  = fabs(d_last);
00507             backwRadius = fabs(d_begn);
00508             //  Calculate other parameters of ellipsoid 
00509             volume = 4.* M_PI * clusterLongestRadius * r2 * r3/3.; // ellipsoid volume
00510             ellipAverageRadius = pow(volume,0.333333); // average radius
00511             density = energySum/volume;  // density [GeV]/[cm]
00512 
00513             float r_min_ave;
00514             r_min_ave = sqrt(r2 * r3/2.0);
00515             if(r_min_ave < 0.001) r_min_ave = chisq;
00516             if(r_min_ave < 0.001) r_min_ave = 0.5*rs.detector.cell_size;
00517 
00518             clusterLongestRadius = max(max(forwRadius, backwRadius), clusterLongestRadius);
00519             ecc = r_min_ave/clusterLongestRadius; // Cluster Eccentricity
00520 
00521             if(ecc > 1.0)
00522               cout<<" BUG ::: Eccentricity > 1 ; Chisq = "<<chi[0]
00523                   <<" : "<<clusterLongestRadius
00524                   <<" : "<<r_min_ave
00525                   <<" : "<<ecc
00526                   <<endl;
00527 
00528           } else if(nnn == 2){ // 2-pt cluster parameters    line in space
00529             RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this);
00530             hitIterator.next();
00531             Hit &first = *hitIterator;
00532             hitIterator.next();
00533             Hit &second = *hitIterator;
00534 
00535             Vector3D vect(second.cartesianPoint.x - first.cartesianPoint.x,
00536                           second.cartesianPoint.y - first.cartesianPoint.y,
00537                           second.cartesianPoint.z - first.cartesianPoint.z);
00538 
00539             clusterAxisVector.calc(directionCos(vect));
00540 
00541 
00542             Vector3D vend = centerOfGravity + clusterAxisVector; 
00543             // Correct direction --- should go from the center of coordinates
00544             if(vend.module() - clusterRadius < 0.)
00545               clusterAxisVector.calc(-clusterAxisVector.x, -clusterAxisVector.y, -clusterAxisVector.z);
00546             volume  = sqrt(vect.length2()) * rs.detector.cell_size * rs.detector.sampling;
00547             density = energySum/volume;  // density [GeV]/[cm]
00548 
00549             // Find first and last points of cluster
00550             Vector3D diffVec_first(first.cartesianPoint.x - centerOfGravity.x,
00551                                    first.cartesianPoint.y - centerOfGravity.y,
00552                                    first.cartesianPoint.z - centerOfGravity.z);
00553 
00554             backwRadius = clusterAxisVector.dot(diffVec_first);
00555 
00556             Vector3D diffVec_second(second.cartesianPoint.x - centerOfGravity.x,
00557                                     second.cartesianPoint.y - centerOfGravity.y,
00558                                     second.cartesianPoint.z - centerOfGravity.z);
00559 
00560             backwRadius = clusterAxisVector.dot(diffVec_second);
00561         
00562             begn = &first;
00563             last = &second;
00564 
00565             if(backwRadius > forwRadius){
00566               double tmp  = backwRadius;
00567               backwRadius = forwRadius;
00568               forwRadius  = tmp;
00569               last = &first;
00570               begn = &second;
00571               last = &first;
00572             }
00573 
00574             chi[0] = chi[1] = chi[2] = 0.5 * rs.detector.cell_size;
00575 
00576           } else if(nnn == 1){ // 1-pt cluster parameters  point in space
00577             //  vol = length * tile_area * sampling (latter to do)
00578             begn = last = getChild<Hit>();
00579           } else
00580             cerr<<"Empty cluster?"<<endl;
00581         }
00582         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00586         void finalize(DeepAnalysis &rs){
00587           unsigned nnn = getNumberOf<Hit>();
00588 
00589           if(nnn > 2){
00590             if(col != EM)
00591               // Cluster color (Green or Blue) is take from cluster eccentricity
00592               col = (ecc < rs.detector.ecc_trk_hadr_sel)? TRK : HAD;
00593 
00594             if(nnn < 4){
00595               for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this); hitIterator.next();)
00596                 if(hitIterator->getParent<NeutGroup>()){
00597                   col = NEUTR;
00598                   break;
00599                 }
00600             }
00601 
00602             for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this); hitIterator.next();){
00603               Hit &hit =*hitIterator;
00604               KindGroup *hcol = hit.getParent<KindGroup>();
00605 
00606               if(col == NEUTR){
00607                 rs.unlink(&hit, hcol);
00608                 if(!hit.getParent<NeutGroup>())
00609                   rs.append(&hit, rs.neutrons);
00610               } else {
00611                 rs.unlink(&hit, rs.neutrons);
00612                 if(hcol != rs.kind[col]){
00613                   rs.unlink(&hit, hcol);
00614                   rs.append(&hit, rs.kind[col]);
00615                 }
00616               }
00617             }
00618 
00619           } else { // destroy cluster with number of hits less than 3
00620             for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this); hitIterator.next();){
00621               Hit &hit = *hitIterator;
00622               rs.unlink(&hit, hit.getParent<KindGroup>());
00623               if(!hit.getParent<NeutGroup>())
00624                 rs.append(&hit, rs.neutrons);
00625             }
00626             rs.unlink(this); // forget it
00627           }
00628         }
00629         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00633         void rotate_point(Point3D &point){
00634           float rx = point.x * v1[0] + point.y * v2[0] + point.z * v3[0] + centerOfGravity.x;
00635           float ry = point.x * v1[1] + point.y * v2[1] + point.z * v3[1] + centerOfGravity.y;
00636           float rz = point.x * v1[2] + point.y * v2[2] + point.z * v3[2] + centerOfGravity.z;
00637           point.x = rx;
00638           point.y = ry;
00639           point.z = rz;
00640         }
00641         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00644         void print() {
00645           static const char *tname[] = { "EMPTY","ONEHIT","2D","CHAIN","JOINED","EXT" };
00646           static const char *cname[] = { "EM","TRK","HAD","","NEUT" };
00647           cout<<" Cluster ("<<tname[type]<<") : ";
00648           cout<<cname[col]<<" "<<getNumberOf<Hit>()<<" E = "<<energySum;
00649           cout<<endl;
00650         }

00665         void draw_star(unsigned type, unsigned color){
00666 // #ifdef HAVE_CED

00668 //                1<<CED_LAYER_SHIFT, 4, 0xd1cd04);

00670           for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(this); hitIterator.next();){

00688         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00691         void draw_ellipse(unsigned type, unsigned color){
00692           static bool init_done = false;
00693           static float GmSIN[41], GmCOS[41];
00694 
00695           if(!init_done){
00696             init_done  = true;
00697             float DPHI = M_PI/20.;
00698             float PHI  = 0.;
00699             for(int i = 0; i < 40; i++, PHI+=DPHI){
00700               GmSIN[i] = sin(PHI);
00701               GmCOS[i] = cos(PHI);
00702             }
00703             GmSIN[40] = GmSIN[0];
00704             GmCOS[40] = GmCOS[0];
00705           }
00706 
00707           if( hypot3(forwRadius, r2, r3) < 0.001)
00708             return; // AZ: too small
00709           // Draw v1is
00710           Point3D p0(centerOfGravity.x + forwRadius * v1[0],
00711                      centerOfGravity.y + forwRadius * v1[1],
00712                      centerOfGravity.z + forwRadius * v1[2]);
00713           line(centerOfGravity, p0, type, 1, color);
00714 
00715           Point3D p1(centerOfGravity.x - backwRadius * v1[0],
00716                      centerOfGravity.y - backwRadius * v1[1],
00717                      centerOfGravity.z - backwRadius * v1[2]);
00718           line(centerOfGravity, p1, type, 1, color);
00719 
00720           Point3D p2(centerOfGravity.x + r2 * v2[0],
00721                      centerOfGravity.y + r2 * v2[1],
00722                      centerOfGravity.z + r2 * v2[2]);
00723 
00724           Point3D p3(centerOfGravity.x - r2 * v2[0],
00725                      centerOfGravity.y - r2 * v2[1],
00726                      centerOfGravity.z - r2 * v2[2]);
00727           line(p2, p3, type, 1, color);
00728 
00729           Point3D p4(centerOfGravity.x + r3 * v3[0],
00730                      centerOfGravity.y + r3 * v3[1],
00731                      centerOfGravity.z + r3 * v3[2]);
00732 
00733           Point3D p5(centerOfGravity.x - r3 * v3[0],
00734                      centerOfGravity.y - r3 * v3[1],
00735                      centerOfGravity.z - r3 * v3[2]);
00736           line(p4, p5, type, 2, color);
00737 
00738           Point3D a[41];
00739           for(int i = 0; i < 41; i++){
00740             a[i].calc(0., r2 * GmCOS[i], r3 * GmSIN[i]);
00741             rotate_point(a[i]);
00742           }
00743 
00744           for(int i = 0; i < 40; i++)
00745             line(a[i], a[i+1], type, 1, color);
00746       
00747           for(int i = 0; i < 41; i++){
00748             a[i].calc((GmCOS[i]>0.?forwRadius:backwRadius) * GmCOS[i], 0., r3 * GmSIN[i]);
00749             rotate_point(a[i]);
00750           }
00751 
00752           for(int i = 0; i < 40; i++)
00753             line(a[i], a[i+1], type, 1, color);
00754       
00755           for(int i = 0;i < 41; i++){
00756             a[i].calc((GmCOS[i]>0.?forwRadius:backwRadius) * GmCOS[i], r2 * GmSIN[i], 0.);
00757             rotate_point(a[i]);
00758           }
00759 
00760           for(int i = 0; i < 40; i++)
00761             line(a[i], a[i+1], type, 1, color);
00762         }
00763     }; //end of class Cluster
00764 
00765 
00766     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00767     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00768     //    Create a main structure for reconstruction
00769     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00771     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00772     HitGroup  *all_hits;
00773     Group     *clusters;
00774     Group     *joingroups;
00775     KindGroup *kind[KIND_COUNT];
00776     NeutGroup *neutrons;
00778     unsigned  all_hits_count;
00780     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00783     DeepAnalysis() : RS() {
00784       all_hits_count = 0;
00785       all_hits       = alloc<HitGroup>();
00786       clusters       = alloc<Group>();
00787       joingroups     = alloc<Group>();
00788 
00789       for(unsigned i = 0; i < KIND_COUNT; i++){
00790         kind[i] = alloc<KindGroup>();
00791       }
00792       neutrons = alloc<NeutGroup>();
00793     }
00794     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00797     void cluster_from_singles(KindGroup &gr, bool mark_neutrons){
00798       RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&gr);
00799 
00800       while(hitIterator.next()){
00801         if(hitIterator->getParent<Cluster>()) continue;
00802 
00803         Cluster *cl = alloc<Cluster>();
00804         cl->type = Cluster::ONEHIT;
00805         append(cl, clusters);
00806         append(&hitIterator, cl);
00807 
00808         if(mark_neutrons) append(&hitIterator, neutrons);
00809       } 
00810     }
00811     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00814     void cluster_finder_2d_split(Hit &hit, unsigned InClust_count, Cluster **InClust)
00815     {
00816       float xx = rndm(0);
00817       float rr = 0;
00818 
00819       for(unsigned i = 0; i < InClust_count; i++){
00820         rr += InClust[i]->e2d;
00821       }
00822 
00823       float pos = 0;
00824       for(unsigned i = 0; i < InClust_count; i++){
00825         pos += InClust[i]->e2d;
00826 
00827         if(xx <= pos/rr){
00828           append(&hit, InClust[i]);
00829           break;
00830         }
00831       }
00832     }
00833     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00836     class SpecialHist2D : public HistogrammPT {
00837       public:
00839         virtual bool Book(const MinMaxRange<double> &p_lim,
00840                           const MinMaxRange<double> &t_lim,
00841                           double _step=0.006){
00842           // AZ: need it to change _step idea, for backward compat...
00843           int np = int(p_lim.range()/_step);
00844           Put2Range(np, 5, 360);
00845 
00846           int nt = int(t_lim.range()/_step);
00847           Put2Range(nt, 5, 180);
00848 
00849           if( !p.set(p_lim, p_lim.range()/np) || !t.set(t_lim, t_lim.range()/nt) )
00850             return false;
00851 
00852           c_count = p.n * t.n;
00853           c = new HCell[c_count];
00854 
00855           for(unsigned p_i = 0; p_i < p.n; p_i++)
00856             for(unsigned t_i = 0; t_i < t.n; t_i++){
00857               HCell &pc = *get_by_index(p_i, t_i);
00858               pc.p_i = p_i;
00859               pc.t_i = t_i;
00860               pc.val = 0.;
00861             }
00862           return true;
00863         }
00864     };
00865     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00869     void cluster_finder_2d(HitGroup &hitGroup, Group &ring)
00870     {
00871       unsigned nht = hitGroup.getNumberOf<Hit>();
00872       if(!nht) return;   // no hits at all
00873 
00874       if(nht == 1){ // one hit - one cluster
00875         Cluster *cl = alloc<Cluster>();
00876         append(hitGroup.getChild<Hit>(), cl);
00877         cl->calc_stat();
00878         cl->type=Cluster::ONEHIT;
00879         append(cl,&ring);
00880         return;
00881       }
00882 
00883       hitGroup.calc_stat();
00884       hitGroup.phi_g.extend(0.0001); //  To be sure that all hits are in interval
00885       hitGroup.theta_g.extend(0.0001);
00886       SpecialHist2D hst;
00887       hst.Book(hitGroup.phi_g, hitGroup.theta_g, detector.a_delta); // in radians
00888 
00889 #ifdef DeepAnalysis_DEBUG
00890       cout<<"  Cl_2d : "<<nht<<" hits"
00891           <<", Phi "<<hitGroup.phi_g.min<<" : "<<hitGroup.phi_g.max<<"/"<<hst.p.n
00892           <<", Theta "<<hitGroup.theta_g.min<<" : "<<hitGroup.theta_g.max<<"/"<<hst.t.n
00893           <<", delta = "<<detector.a_delta<<"("<<detector.a_delta*RADDEG<<")"
00894           <<endl;
00895 #endif
00896       double min_r_max = max(hst.p.step, hst.t.step)/sqrt(2.) + 0.00001;
00897 
00898       for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&hitGroup); hitIterator.next();)
00899         hst.Fill(hitIterator->sphere3d, hitIterator->amplGeV);
00900       /*
00901           c======================================================================
00902           c         Most tricky part of the clustering algorithm;
00903           c  calculation of angular energy [MeV] radius for cluster center candidate
00904           c  it takes into account the exponential shower shape in radius
00905           c  This is equivalent to some cone parameters in usual cone cluster finder
00906           c         Should be tuned very carefully
00907           c======================================================================
00908           c      DATA    sph_cutE_sup /3.0/, coeff_radE_sup /1.0/
00909           c======================================================================
00910           */
00911       double sph_cut1 = 1.1 * detector.sph_cut;
00912       double summ_log = log(1000. * hitGroup.energySum);// Logarithm of whole energy in MeV
00913       int nmax = min(nht, hst.c_count);
00914       unsigned adr[nmax]; // indexes of sorted cells
00915 
00916 
00917       // Sort histogram by bin amplitudes
00918       BiggestMfromN(hst.c_count, hst.c, nmax,(HistogrammPT::HCell *)0, adr);
00919 
00920       for(int i = 0; i < nmax; i++){
00921         HistogrammPT::HCell &c = hst.c[adr[i]];
00922 
00923         if(c.val == 0.) break; // because it was sorted...
00924 
00925         // calculation of angular energy [MeV] radius for cluster center candidate
00926         double r_max = detector.sph_cut * log(1000. * c.val)/summ_log;
00927         if(r_max <= min_r_max) r_max=min_r_max;
00928 
00929         // Find the unique cluster centers taking into account shower model, 
00930         //  if distance to the next amplitude  >  cut parameter
00931         bool found = false;
00932         for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(&ring); clusterIterator.next();){
00933           Cluster &cl = *clusterIterator;
00934 
00935           if( (fabs(hst.get_t(c) - cl.sp2d.t) < sph_cut1) && 
00936               (angle_dist(hst.get_t(c), hst.get_p(c), cl.sp2d.t, cl.sp2d.p) 
00937                <= cl.sp2d.r)){
00938             found = true;
00939             break;
00940           }
00941         }
00942         if(found) continue;
00943 
00944         Cluster *cl = alloc<Cluster>();
00945         initializeSphere(cl->sp2d, r_max, hst.get_t(c), hst.get_p(c));
00946 
00947         cl->e2d = c.val;
00948         append(cl, &ring);
00949       }
00950 
00951       //  Energy of cluster center is at the cl.e2d;  Theta and Phi are at cl.sp
00952       //  Cluster predicted raius is at the cl.sp2d.r;  Theta and Phi are at cl.sp
00953       Cluster *InClust[ring.getNumberOf<Cluster>()];
00954 
00955       //  Assign  hits to cluster with weight = amplitude of MAX
00956       for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&hitGroup); hitIterator.next();){ 
00957         Hit &hit = *hitIterator;
00958 
00959         unsigned InClust_count=0;
00960         for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(&ring); clusterIterator.next();){
00961           Cluster &cl = *clusterIterator;
00962           if((fabs(hit.sphere3d.t - cl.sp2d.t) < sph_cut1) && 
00963              (angle_dist(hit.sphere3d.t, hit.sphere3d.p, cl.sp2d.t, cl.sp2d.p) <= cl.sp2d.r))
00964             InClust[InClust_count++] = &clusterIterator;
00965         } 
00966         if(!InClust_count) continue;     // not in cluster  
00967     
00968         if(InClust_count==1)  append(&hitIterator,InClust[0]);
00969         else // several candidates
00970           cluster_finder_2d_split(hit, InClust_count, InClust);
00971       } //  End loop along hits
00972 
00973       // remove empty clusters and calculate stats
00974       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(&ring); clusterIterator.next();){ 
00975         unsigned nht = clusterIterator->getNumberOf<Hit>();
00976         if(!nht) unlink(&clusterIterator);
00977         else {
00978           clusterIterator->calc_stat();
00979           if(nht == 1)
00980             clusterIterator->type = Cluster::ONEHIT;
00981           else
00982             clusterIterator->type=Cluster::CL2D;
00983         }
00984       }
00985 
00986       // there is one special case ...
00987       for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&hitGroup); hitIterator.next();){ 
00988         if(hitIterator->getParent<Cluster>()) continue;
00989 
00990         Cluster *cl = alloc<Cluster>();
00991         append(cl, &ring);
00992 
00993         cl->type = Cluster::ONEHIT;
00994         append(&hitIterator, cl);
00995         cl->calc_stat();
00996       }
00997 
00998     }
00999     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01003     void cluster_finder_3d(KindGroup &gr, bool mark_neutrons){
01004       //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01005       if(gr.getNumberOf<Hit>() < 3){
01006         cluster_from_singles(gr, mark_neutrons);
01007         return;
01008       }
01009 
01010       unsigned color = 0xf91111;
01011       if(&gr == kind[TRK]) color = 0x029102;
01012       if(&gr == kind[HAD]) color = 0x03abc1;
01013 
01014       gr.calc_stat(); // Calculate spherical divisions
01015       unsigned nradius_g = gr.layer_g.range(); // For the simplest case without overlaping
01016       if(!nradius_g)
01017         nradius_g = 1; // AZ: protection against 0!
01018       // Estimation of sampling step
01019       double a_sampl = gr.radius_g.range()/nradius_g; 
01020       nradius_g++;
01021       if(nradius_g < 2)
01022         nradius_g = 2;
01023       //  R-step should be close to the sampling step
01024       //    double dr = detector.sampling+(gr.radius_g.range() + a_sampl)/nradius_g; 
01025       double dr = (gr.radius_g.range() + a_sampl)/nradius_g; 
01026       if(dr < detector.sampling)
01027         dr = detector.sampling;
01029       //    R_parameter is very critical for the cluster joining
01030       //      It depends on the calorimeter sampling structure
01031       //              as well as on the cell sizes
01033       float R_join = detector.join_factor*dr;
01034       if(R_join < detector.join_factor*detector.ext_cell_size)
01035         R_join = detector.join_factor*detector.ext_cell_size;
01036       Range<double> rr(gr.radius_g.min - 0.5*a_sampl);
01037       rr.max += dr;
01038       rr.extend(1.e-5);
01039  
01040       Group *rings = new Group[nradius_g];
01041       HitGroup hg;
01042 
01043       // Loop along radial shells
01044       for(unsigned j = 0; j < nradius_g; j++, rr.min += dr, rr.max += dr){ 
01045         RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&gr);
01046         while(hitIterator.next()){
01047           if(rr.inrange(hitIterator->sphere3d.r) && !hitIterator->getParent<Cluster>())
01048             append(&hitIterator, &hg);
01049         }
01050 
01051         cluster_finder_2d(hg, rings[j]);
01052         unlink(&hg); // AZ: cleanup ring and prepare for next iteration
01053       }// End loop along radial shells
01054 
01055       // AZ: Original algo minimized distances first. If A->B and C->B,
01056       //     than A->B wins. And while C will start new chain, it will
01057       //     be alone since B is already taken.
01058       //     Note: C will be marked as a chain (while still alone)
01059       // !!!! Bug in original code generate another result....
01060 
01061       for(unsigned j = 0; j < nradius_g - 1; j++){ // AZ: Prepare for sort...
01062         unsigned max_cand_count=
01063           rings[j].getNumberOf<Cluster>()*rings[j+1].getNumberOf<Cluster>();
01064         unsigned cand_count = 0;
01065         Cluster *cand[max_cand_count][2];
01066         double dist[max_cand_count];
01067 
01068         for(RSIterator<Cluster> baseRing(rings+j); baseRing.next();) // base ring
01069           for(RSIterator<Cluster> nextRing(rings+j+1); nextRing.next();){ // next ring
01070             double d = baseRing->centerOfGravity.dist(nextRing->centerOfGravity);
01071 
01072             if( d < R_join){
01073               dist[cand_count]      = d;
01074               cand[cand_count][0]   = &baseRing; // collect possible candidates
01075               cand[cand_count++][1] = &nextRing;
01076             }
01077           } //next ring  as well as a base ring also finished here
01078 
01079         unsigned scand[cand_count];
01080         SmallestMfromN(cand_count, dist, cand_count, (double *)0, scand);
01081 
01082         for(unsigned i = 0; i < cand_count; i++){
01083           Cluster *baseRing = cand[scand[i]][0];
01084           Cluster *nextRing = cand[scand[i]][1];
01085 
01086 // #ifdef HAVE_CED
01087 //        //draw lines (change coordinate system back before drawing)
01088 //        double x1 = baseRing->centerOfGravity.z;
01089 //        double y1 = -baseRing->centerOfGravity.y;
01090 //        double z1 = baseRing->centerOfGravity.x + detector.shift;
01091 //        double x2 = nextRing->centerOfGravity.z;
01092 //        double y2 = -nextRing->centerOfGravity.y;
01093 //        double z2 = nextRing->centerOfGravity.x + detector.shift;
01094 // #endif
01095         
01096           // Some cluster is already in some chain
01097           if(baseRing->type == Cluster::EMPTY || nextRing->type == Cluster::CHAIN){ 
01098 // #ifdef HAVE_CED
01099 //          ced_line(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2, 16<<CED_LAYER_SHIFT, 1, 0x565501); //draw lines 
01100 // #endif
01101             continue;
01102           }
01103 // #ifdef HAVE_CED
01104 //        ced_line(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2, 6<<CED_LAYER_SHIFT, 2, color); //draw lines 
01105 //        ced_hit(x1, y1, z1, 6<<CED_LAYER_SHIFT, 1, 0xf7f43b); //draw lines 
01106 // #endif
01107 
01108           // Chain clusters by moving hits, !!! not recalc stats !!!
01109           baseRing->type = Cluster::EMPTY; 
01110           nextRing->type = Cluster::CHAIN;
01111 
01112           for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(baseRing); hitIterator.next();){
01113             append(&hitIterator, nextRing);
01114           }
01115           unlink(baseRing); // forget it
01116         } // loop along candidates
01117       }   // loop alog all spherical shells
01118 
01119       int n_one  = 0;
01120       int n_many = 0;
01121       int n_hits = 0;
01122 
01123       for(unsigned j = 0; j < nradius_g; j++){ // collect results
01124         for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(rings+j); clusterIterator.next();){
01125           if(clusterIterator->type != Cluster::CHAIN && mark_neutrons){
01126             for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&clusterIterator); hitIterator.next();){
01127               Cluster *newcl = alloc<Cluster>();
01128               append(&hitIterator, newcl);
01129               newcl->type = Cluster::ONEHIT;
01130               append(newcl, clusters);
01131               newcl->calc_prop(*this, false);
01132               n_one++;
01133             }
01134             unlink(&clusterIterator);
01135 
01136           } else {
01137             n_many++;
01138             n_hits += clusterIterator->getNumberOf<Hit>();
01139             append(&clusterIterator, clusters);
01140             clusterIterator->calc_prop(*this, !mark_neutrons);
01141           }
01142         }
01143         unlink(rings+j);
01144       }
01145       delete [] rings;
01146     }
01147     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01150     void join_group(Cluster *cl,JoinGroup *jg){
01151       JoinGroup *cjg = cl->getParent<JoinGroup>();
01152 
01153       if(!cjg){
01154         append(cl, jg);
01155         return;
01156       } else if(cjg == jg)
01157         return;
01158       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(cjg); clusterIterator.next();) // move cjg to jg
01159         append(&clusterIterator,jg);
01160       unlink(cjg); // forget it
01161     }
01162     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01165     void make_join_group(Cluster *cl0,Cluster *cl1,Cluster *cl2=0){
01166       JoinGroup *jg = cl0->getParent<JoinGroup>();
01167 
01168       if(!jg) 
01169         jg = cl1->getParent<JoinGroup>();
01170       if(!jg && cl2)
01171         jg = cl2->getParent<JoinGroup>();
01172       if(!jg){
01173         jg = alloc<JoinGroup>();
01174         append(jg, joingroups);
01175       }
01176       join_group(cl0, jg);
01177       join_group(cl1, jg);
01178 
01179       if(cl2)
01180         join_group(cl2, jg);
01181     }
01182     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01185     void cluster_join(bool for_em){
01186       // Collect a few clusters together
01187       double reason_dist = detector.cut_3d_em;
01188       if(!for_em){
01189         reason_dist = detector.cut_3d_had;
01190       }
01191 
01192       unsigned color = 0xf91111;
01193 
01194       // AZ:!!! Method is rewritten. I hope logic is still the same.
01195       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();){
01196         if(clusterIterator->type == Cluster::ONEHIT || 
01197            clusterIterator->ecc >= (for_em?0.35:0.45))//  Parameter ???
01198           continue;
01199 
01200         // Can be compared only em with em or had and mip both together
01201         if(!for_em && clusterIterator->col != TRK && clusterIterator->col != HAD) // for track-like only
01202           continue;
01203 
01204         for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator2(clusters); clusterIterator2.next();){
01205           if(&clusterIterator == &clusterIterator2)
01206             continue;
01207 
01208           if(clusterIterator2->type == Cluster::ONEHIT || 
01209              clusterIterator2->ecc >= (for_em?0.35:0.45))//  Parameter ???
01210             continue;
01211 
01212           if(!for_em && clusterIterator2->col != TRK && clusterIterator2->col != HAD) // for track-like only
01213             continue;
01214 
01215           if(!clusterIterator->begn || !clusterIterator2->last){
01216             cerr<<"BUG: properties are not calculated... found in cluster join"
01217                 <<endl;
01218             continue;
01219           }
01220 
01221           Hit &firstHit = *clusterIterator->begn;
01222           Hit &lastHit = *clusterIterator2->last;
01223 
01224           Vector3D vect(lastHit.cartesianPoint.x - firstHit.cartesianPoint.x,
01225                         lastHit.cartesianPoint.y - firstHit.cartesianPoint.y,
01226                         lastHit.cartesianPoint.z - firstHit.cartesianPoint.z);
01227 
01228 // #ifdef HAVE_CED
01229 //        //draw lines (change coordinate system back before drawing)
01230 //        double x1 =  firstHit.cartesianPoint.z;
01231 //        double y1 = -firstHit.cartesianPoint.y;
01232 //        double z1 =  firstHit.cartesianPoint.x + detector.shift;
01233 //        double x2 =  lastHit.cartesianPoint.z;
01234 //        double y2 = -lastHit.cartesianPoint.y;
01235 //        double z2 =  lastHit.cartesianPoint.x + detector.shift;
01236 
01237 //        ced_line(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2, 17<<CED_LAYER_SHIFT, 1, 0x565501);
01238 //        ced_hit(x1, y1, z1, 6<<CED_LAYER_SHIFT, 1, 0xf7f43b);
01239 // #endif
01240 
01241           Vector3D dirco = directionCos(vect);
01242           double dcheck = vect.module();
01243 
01244           if(dcheck >= reason_dist)
01245             continue;   
01246 
01247           //draw lines 
01248           if(clusterIterator->col == TRK && clusterIterator2->col == TRK ) color = 0x029102;
01249           if(clusterIterator->col == HAD && clusterIterator2->col == HAD ) color = 0x029102;
01250           if(clusterIterator->col == HAD && clusterIterator2->col == TRK ) color = 0x0404ef;
01251           if(clusterIterator->col == TRK && clusterIterator2->col == HAD ) color = 0x0404ef;
01252 
01253 // #ifdef HAVE_CED
01254 //        ced_line(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2, 7<<CED_LAYER_SHIFT, 2, color);
01255 // #endif
01256           double rsp = 0.5 * dcheck;
01257           Vector3D sp = firstHit.cartesianPoint + lastHit.cartesianPoint;
01258           sp.mult(0.5);
01259 
01260           // Find clusters joined without intermediate hit
01261           //  Parameter ???
01262           if(dcheck < (for_em?2.0:2.5) * detector.ext_cell_size || 
01263              dcheck < (for_em?2.0:2.5) * detector.sampling)
01264             make_join_group(&clusterIterator, &clusterIterator2);  // These clusters should be joined
01265 
01266           // Find one-hit cluster that is in between of two others
01267           for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator3(clusters); clusterIterator3.next();){
01268             if(clusterIterator3->type != Cluster::ONEHIT)
01269               continue; // One hit cluster will be joined  ONLY
01270 
01271             double dhit = dist2line(clusterIterator3->centerOfGravity, sp, dirco);
01272             Vector3D rv(sp, clusterIterator3->centerOfGravity);
01273             float shit = rv.module();
01274 
01275             //  Parameter ???
01276             if(dhit < 2.5 * detector.ext_cell_size && shit < rsp)
01277               //  All these clusters should be joined
01278               make_join_group(&clusterIterator, &clusterIterator2, &clusterIterator3); 
01279           }
01280         }
01281       }
01282 
01283       // Now it's time to really join clusters...
01284       for(RSIterator<JoinGroup> ji(joingroups); ji.next();){
01285         Cluster *bc = 0; // cluster to join into
01286 
01287         for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(&ji); clusterIterator.next();){
01288           if(!bc)
01289             bc = &clusterIterator;
01290           else {
01291             for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&clusterIterator); hitIterator.next();)
01292               append(&hitIterator, bc);
01293             unlink(&clusterIterator); // forget about cluster (so hits will be also unlinked)
01294           }
01295         }
01296         bc->type = Cluster::JOINED;
01297         bc->calc_prop(*this);
01298         unlink(&ji);
01299       }
01300       unlink(joingroups);
01301     }
01302 
01303     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01306     void em_shower_find(){
01307       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();){
01308         if(clusterIterator->getNumberOf<Hit>() < 3) //skip small clusters
01309           continue;
01310 
01311         unsigned found = 0;
01312         for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(all_hits); hitIterator.next();){
01313           Cluster *pcl = hitIterator->getParent<Cluster>();
01314 
01315           if(pcl && (pcl == &clusterIterator || pcl->getNumberOf<Hit>() > 4))// was 2
01316             continue; // skip hits from this cluster and skip "big" clusters
01317           // AZ:??? For 2 hits clusters one hit can left out...
01318 
01319           Vector3D d(hitIterator->cartesianPoint.x - clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.x,
01320                      hitIterator->cartesianPoint.y - clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.y,
01321                      hitIterator->cartesianPoint.z - clusterIterator->centerOfGravity.z);
01322 
01323           float rx =  d.x * clusterIterator->v1[0] + d.y * clusterIterator->v1[1] + d.z * clusterIterator->v1[2];
01324           float ry =  d.x * clusterIterator->v2[0] + d.y * clusterIterator->v2[1] + d.z * clusterIterator->v2[2];
01325           float rz =  d.x * clusterIterator->v3[0] + d.y * clusterIterator->v3[1] + d.z * clusterIterator->v3[2];
01326 
01327           float proj= d.dot(clusterIterator->clusterAxisVector);
01328           float rr = (proj >=0.)?
01329             clusterIterator->forwRadius*detector.elips_forw_to_catch : 
01330             clusterIterator->backwRadius*detector.elips_back_to_catch;
01331 
01332           if(clusterIterator->r2 < 0.00000001 || clusterIterator->r3 < 0.000000001)
01333             continue;
01334 
01335           float rt = max(clusterIterator->r2, clusterIterator->r3) * detector.elips_trans_to_catch;
01336 
01337           float rrr =  (rx/rr) * (rx/rr) + (ry/rt) * (ry/rt) + (rz/rt) * (rz/rt);
01338           if(rrr >= 1.)
01339             continue; // not inside
01340 
01341           found++;
01342           append(&hitIterator, &clusterIterator);
01343 
01344           if(pcl){
01345             unlink(&hitIterator, pcl);
01346             unsigned n = pcl->getNumberOf<Hit>();
01347             if(!n){
01348               // unlink(pcl); // can't do here...
01349               pcl->type = Cluster::EMPTY;
01350             } else { // n==1
01351               pcl->type = Cluster::ONEHIT;
01352               pcl->calc_prop(*this);
01353             }
01354           }
01355 
01356           if(clusterIterator->col == NEUTR){ // hit must change the color
01357             unlink(&hitIterator, hitIterator->getParent<KindGroup>());
01358             append(&hitIterator, neutrons);
01359           } else {
01360             unlink(&hitIterator, neutrons);
01361             if(hitIterator->getParent<KindGroup>() != kind[clusterIterator->col]){
01362               unlink(&hitIterator, hitIterator->getParent<KindGroup>());
01363               append(&hitIterator, kind[clusterIterator->col]);
01364             }
01365           } 
01366         }
01367 
01368         if(found){
01369           clusterIterator->type = Cluster::EXT;
01370           clusterIterator->calc_prop(*this);
01371         }
01372       }  // along all clusters
01373 
01374       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();){
01375         if(clusterIterator->type == Cluster::EMPTY)
01376           unlink(&clusterIterator);
01377       }
01378     }
01379     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01382     void reassignment_small_clusters(KIND k)
01383     {
01384       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();){ 
01385         if(clusterIterator->getNumberOf<Hit>() > 2)
01386           continue;
01387 
01388         for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&clusterIterator); hitIterator.next();){
01389           unlink(&hitIterator, neutrons);
01390           unlink(&hitIterator, hitIterator->getParent<KindGroup>());
01391           append(&hitIterator, kind[k]);
01392         }
01393         unlink(&clusterIterator); // forget it
01394       }
01395     }
01396     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01399     void low_e_clean()
01400     {
01401       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();){
01402         bool found = false;
01403         
01404         for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&clusterIterator); hitIterator.next();){
01405           double dthresh = 0.0;
01406 
01407           if(clusterIterator->col == NEUTR)
01408             dthresh = 0.10;
01409 
01410           if(hitIterator->ampl_mip < hitIterator->thr + dthresh){
01411             found = true;
01412             unlink(&hitIterator);
01413           }
01414 
01415           if(found){
01416             if(!clusterIterator->getChild<Hit>())
01417               unlink(&clusterIterator);
01418             else
01419               clusterIterator->calc_prop(*this);
01420           }
01421         }
01422       }
01423     }
01424     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01427     Hit *add_hit(double _x,double _y,double _z,
01428                  double _am,double _ampl_mip,double _thr,
01429                  unsigned _lay, KIND type,int _addr)
01430     {
01431       if(type >= KIND_COUNT || type < 0){
01432         cerr<<"BUG: Wrong type in add_hit"<<endl;
01433         return 0;
01434       }
01435 
01436       Hit *hit = alloc<Hit>();
01437       hit->set(all_hits_count++, _x, _y, _z, _am, _ampl_mip, _thr, _lay, _addr);
01438       append(hit, all_hits);
01439       append(hit, kind[type]);
01440       return hit;
01441     }

01492     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01499     void color_clusters_stat(KIND k, unsigned &ncl, unsigned &n_sum, double &e_sum){
01500       ncl = n_sum = 0;
01501       e_sum = 0.;
01502 
01503       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();)
01504         if(clusterIterator->col == k){
01505           n_sum += clusterIterator->getNumberOf<DeepAnalysis::Hit>();
01506           e_sum += clusterIterator->energySum;
01507           ncl++;
01508         }
01509     }
01510     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01514     void color_clusters_print_stat(KIND k){
01515       const char *s_start[]={"41m  EM","42m TRK","46m HAD"};
01516       unsigned n_sum,ncl;
01517       double e_sum;
01518 
01519       color_clusters_stat(k, ncl, n_sum, e_sum);
01520 
01521       if(!n_sum || (unsigned)k >= sizeof(s_start)/sizeof(*s_start))
01522         return;
01523 
01524       cout<<"\x1b[30;"<<s_start[k]<<"-Like  \x1b[0m\x1b[30m    energy sum = "
01525           <<e_sum<<" in "<<n_sum<<" hits in "<<ncl<<" clusters"<<endl;
01526     }

01528     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01531     void result_check(){
01532       for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(all_hits); hitIterator.next();){
01533         if(hitIterator->getParent<KindGroup>() && !hitIterator->getParent<Cluster>()){
01534           cout<<"Logical bug: colored hit ("<<hitIterator->idx<<") without cluster! "
01535               <<hitIterator->cartesianPoint.x<<" "
01536               <<hitIterator->cartesianPoint.y<<" "
01537               <<hitIterator->cartesianPoint.z
01538               <<endl;
01539         }
01540       }
01541 
01542       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();){
01543         RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(&clusterIterator);
01544         hitIterator.next();
01545 
01546         Point3D last(hitIterator->cartesianPoint);
01547         while(hitIterator.next()){
01548 // #ifdef HAVE_CED
01549 //         ced_line(last.x, last.y, last.z,
01550 //                  hitIterator->cartesianPoint.x,
01551 //                  hitIterator->cartesianPoint.y,
01552 //                  hitIterator->cartesianPoint.z,
01553 //                  19<<CED_LAYER_SHIFT, 1, 0xffffff);
01554 // #endif
01555           last = hitIterator->cartesianPoint;
01556         }
01557       }
01558     }
01559     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01562     void event_move(){
01563       double tmp; 
01564 
01565       for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(all_hits); hitIterator.next();){
01566         tmp = hitIterator->cartesianPoint.x;
01567 
01568         hitIterator->cartesianPoint.x = hitIterator->cartesianPoint.z - detector.shift;// was minus
01569         hitIterator->cartesianPoint.z = tmp; 
01570         hitIterator->cartesianPoint.y = -hitIterator->cartesianPoint.y;
01571         hitIterator->sphere3d.calc(hitIterator->cartesianPoint);
01572       }
01573     }
01574     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01577     void event_move_back(){
01578       double tmp; 
01579       for(RSIterator<Hit> hitIterator(all_hits); hitIterator.next();){
01580         tmp = hitIterator->cartesianPoint.x + detector.shift;
01581 
01582         hitIterator->cartesianPoint.x = hitIterator->cartesianPoint.z;
01583         hitIterator->cartesianPoint.z = tmp;
01584         hitIterator->cartesianPoint.y = -hitIterator->cartesianPoint.y;
01585         hitIterator->sphere3d.calc(hitIterator->cartesianPoint);
01586       }
01587 
01588       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();){
01589         clusterIterator->calc_prop(*this,false);
01590       }
01591     }
01592     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01599     void reconstruction(){ 
01600       //-----------------------------------------------------------------------    
01601       //    cout<<"        NO CLUSTER JOINING             "<<endl;
01602       all_hits->calc_stat();
01603       detector.init(all_hits->radius_g.min);
01604       event_move();
01605 
01606       //    cout<<"  -----------------  EM like  -------------------------"<<endl;
01607       cluster_finder_3d(*(kind[EM]), false);
01608       cluster_join(true);
01609       em_shower_find();
01610       reassignment_small_clusters(TRK);
01611 
01612       //    cout<<"  ----------------- TRK like  -------------------------"<<endl;
01613       cluster_finder_3d(*(kind[TRK]), false);// was true
01614       //    cluster_join(false);
01615       reassignment_small_clusters(HAD);
01616 
01617       //    cout<<"  ----------------- HAD like  -------------------------"<<endl;
01618       cluster_finder_3d(*(kind[HAD]), true);
01619       //    cluster_join(false);
01620       //    low_e_clean();
01621       event_move_back();
01622       for(RSIterator<Cluster> clusterIterator(clusters); clusterIterator.next();)
01623         clusterIterator->finalize(*this);
01624       //    result_check();
01625       //Reconstruction is finished here
01626     }
01627 
01628 };
01629 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01633 inline DeepAnalysis::KIND DeepAnalysis::Hit::get_color(DeepAnalysis &deepAnalysis){
01634   if(getParent<NeutGroup>()) 
01635     return NEUTR;
01636   if(getParent<KindGroup>() == deepAnalysis.kind[EM])
01637     return EM;
01638   if(getParent<KindGroup>() == deepAnalysis.kind[TRK])
01639     return TRK;
01640 
01641   return HAD;
01642 }
